item.title: Erin add a quote by Marie Sexton
item.description: "Jared?” His fingers were playing gently in my curls. “Yes?” I was more than halfway asleep, perfectly warm and content, back in my own bed. With him. “Say it for me.” “You’re heavy.” “No.” “You’re a manipulative bastard.” “No.” He was laughing. “You’re right.” He gave one hard tug on my hair. “That’s not it either.” “I love you?” He sighed contentedly. “That’s the one." -- Marie Sexton

item.title: Erin add a quote by Marie Sexton
Erin add a quote by A.J. Cronin
item.description: "Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength." -- A.J. Cronin

item.title: Erin add a quote by Joe Ancis
item.description: "The only normal people are the ones you don't know very well." -- Joe Ancis
